title: On-chip beam-steering photonic-crystal lasers
title_cn: 片内束控光子晶体激光器
abstract: The development of semiconductor lasers with on-chip controllability of the beam direction is important for a wide range of applications, including mobile laser projection displays, advanced laser printers and chip-to-chip optical communication. Here, we report a novel concept to realize such beam-steering lasers using photonic crystals. Our idea is based on the generation of artificial lasing band edges in the photonic band structure, which determine the resonant condition and output beam direction. We show that the lasing band edge can be tuned by using a composite photonic-crystal structure composed of both square and rectangular lattices, and by varying their relative lattice constants. We demonstrate that lasers based on such composite photonic-crystal structures are able to emit beams in a range of directions that can be dynamically controlled by on-chip integration.
abstract_cn: 具有光束方向的片上可控性的半导体激光器的开发对于包括移动激光投影显示器，高级激光打印机和芯片到芯片的光通信在内的广泛应用非常重要。 在这里，我们报告了一个新颖的概念，可以使用光子晶体来实现这种光束控制激光器。 我们的想法是基于在光子能带结构中产生人工激射能带边缘，它决定了共振条件和输出光束方向。 我们表明，可以通过使用由正方形和矩形晶格组成的复合光子晶体结构以及通过改变它们的相对晶格常数来调整激射带边缘。 我们证明了基于这种复合光子晶体结构的激光器能够在一系列方向上发射光束，这些方向可以通过片上集成来动态控制。

title: Laser-induced water condensation in air
title_cn: 激光诱导的空气中水的凝结
abstract: Triggering rain on demand is an old dream of mankind, with a huge potential socio-economical benefit. To date, efforts have mainly focused on cloud-seeding using silver salt particles. We demonstrate that self-guided ionized filaments generated by ultrashort laser pulses are also able to induce water-cloud condensation in the free, sub-saturated atmosphere. Potential contributing mechanisms include photo-oxidative chemistry and electrostatic effects. As well as revealing the potential for influencing or triggering water precipitation, laser-induced water condensation provides a new tool for the remote sensing of nucleation processes in clouds.
abstract_cn: 按需降雨是人类的古老梦想，具有巨大的潜在社会经济效益。 迄今为止，努力主要集中在使用银盐颗粒播种云。 我们证明了由超短激光脉冲产生的自导离子丝也能够在自由的，不饱和的大气中诱发水云凝结。 潜在的作用机理包括光氧化化学作用和静电作用。 激光诱发的水凝结不仅揭示了影响或触发水降水的潜力，还为遥感云中的成核过程提供了新的工具。

title: Net optical gain in a plasmonic waveguide embedded in a fluorescent polymer
title_cn: 嵌入荧光聚合物中的等离子体波导中的净光学增益
abstract: Plasmonics—the study of the interaction between electromagnetic waves and electron plasmas on metal surfaces and in metallic nanostructures—has received much attention in recent years, with potential new applications ranging from subwavelength photonic circuits to photothermal cancer therapy. In many cases, however, the substantial attenuation of the electromagnetic wave due to absorption (ohmic loss) in the metal is of serious concern. Introduction of optical gain into the dielectric material adjacent to the metal surface has been identified as a means of compensating for the absorption loss, but the experimental realization of lossless propagation or optical gain in plasmonic waveguides has proven elusive. Here, we demonstrate direct proof of plasmonic propagation with net positive gain over macroscopic distances. The gain is provided by an optically pumped layer of fluorescent conjugated polymer adjacent to the metal surface in a dielectric–metal–dielectric plasmonic waveguide.
abstract_cn: Plasmonics近年来，对金属表面和金属纳米结构中电磁波与电子等离子体之间相互作用的研究受到了广泛关注，其潜在的新应用包括从亚波长光子电路到光热癌症治疗。然而，在许多情况下，由于金属中的吸收（欧姆损耗）而导致的电磁波的大幅衰减是非常令人关注的。已经确认将光增益引入邻近金属表面的介电材料中是补偿吸收损耗的一种手段，但是已证明在等离激元波导中无损传播或光增益的实验实现难以实现。在这里，我们展示了在宏观距离上具有净正增益的等离激元传播的直接证据。增益是由与介电质金属等离激元波导中的金属表面相邻的荧光共轭聚合物的光泵浦层提供的。

title: Direct frequency comb synthesis with arbitrary offset and shot-noise-limited phase noise
title_cn: 具有任意偏移和散粒噪声限制的相位噪声的直接频率梳合成
abstract: Carrier-envelope phase stabilization has opened an avenue towards achieving frequency metrology with unprecedented precision and optical pulse generation on the previously inaccessible attosecond timescale. Recently, sub-100-as pulse generation has been demonstrated, approaching the timescale of the fastest transients in atomic physics. However, further progress in attophysics appears to be limited by the performance of the traditional feedback approach used for carrier-envelope phase stabilization. Here, we demonstrate a conceptually different self-referenced feed-forward approach to phase stabilization. This approach requires no complicated locking electronics, does not compromise laser performance, and is demonstrated with 12-as residual timing jitter, which is below the atomic unit of time. This surpasses the precision of previous methods by more than a factor of five and has potential for resolving even the fastest transients in atomic or molecular physics. Such shot-noise-limited comb synthesis may also simplify progress in current research in frequency metrology.
abstract_cn: 载波包络相位稳定已经为实现频率计量学提供了一条途径，该技术以前所未有的精度和光脉冲的产生达到了以前无法达到的秒级。最近，已经证明了亚100脉冲的产生，接近原子物理学中最快瞬变的时间尺度。但是，在原子物理学上的进一步进展似乎受到用于载波包络相位稳定的传统反馈方法性能的限制。在这里，我们演示了概念上不同的自参考前馈方法来稳定相位。这种方法不需要复杂的锁定电子设备，不会损害激光器的性能，并以12个剩余时序抖动进行了演示，该抖动低于原子时间单位。这比以前的方法的精度高出五倍以上，甚至有可能解决原子或分子物理学中最快的瞬变。这种散粒噪声受限的梳状合成也可以简化当前频率计量学的研究进展。

title: Flat dielectric grating reflectors with focusing abilities
title_cn: 具有聚焦能力的平面介质光栅反射器
abstract: Sub-wavelength dielectric gratings have emerged recently as a promising alternative to distributed Bragg reflection dielectric stacks for broadband, high-reflectivity filtering applications. Such a grating structure composed of a single dielectric layer with the appropriate patterning can sometimes perform as well as 30 or 40 dielectric distributed Bragg reflection layers, while providing new functionalities such as polarization control and near-field amplification. In this Letter, we introduce an interesting property of grating mirrors that cannot be realized by their distributed Bragg reflection counterpart: we show that a non-periodic patterning of the grating surface can give full control over the phase front of reflected light while maintaining a high reflectivity. This new feature of dielectric gratings allows the creation of miniature planar focusing elements that could have a substantial impact on a number of applications that depend on low-cost, compact optical components, from laser cavities to CD/DVD read/write heads.
abstract_cn: 亚波长电介质光栅最近成为宽带，高反射率滤波应用中分布式布拉格反射电介质叠层的有前途的替代品。这种由具有适当图案的单个介电层组成的光栅结构有时可以达到30或40个介电分布的布拉格反射层，同时提供诸如偏振控制和近场放大之类的新功能。在这封信中，我们介绍了光栅镜的一个有趣特性，这些特性不能通过其分布式布拉格反射副本来实现：我们表明，光栅表面的非周期性构图可以完全控制反射光的相前，同时保持较高的反射率。反射率。介电光栅的这一新功能允许创建微型平面聚焦元件，这些元件可能会对许多依赖低成本，紧凑型光学组件的应用产生重大影响，从激光腔到CD / DVD读/写头。 >

title: Temporal cavity solitons in one-dimensional Kerr media as bits in an all-optical buffer
title_cn: 一维Kerr介质中的时空孤子作为全光学缓冲区中的位
abstract: Temporal cavity solitons are packets of light persisting in a continuously driven nonlinear resonator. They are robust attracting states, readily excited through a phase-insensitive and wavelength-insensitive process. As such, they constitute an ideal support for bits in an optical buffer that would seamlessly combine three critical telecommunication functions, namely all-optical storage, all-optical reshaping and wavelength conversion. Here, with standard silica optical fibres, we report the first experimental observation of temporal cavity solitons. The cavity solitons are 4 ps long and are used to demonstrate storage of a data stream for more than a second. We also observe interactions of close cavity solitons, revealing for our set-up a potential capacity of up to 45,000 bits at 25 Gbit s−1. More fundamentally, cavity solitons are localized dissipative structures. Therefore, given that silica exhibits a pure instantaneous Kerr nonlinearity, our experiment constitutes one of the simplest examples of self-organization phenomena in nonlinear optics.
abstract_cn: 时空孤子是在连续驱动的非线性谐振器中保留的光包。它们具有很强的吸引状态，很容易通过对相位不敏感和对波长不敏感的过程来激发。这样，它们构成了对光学缓冲器中位的理想支持，该缓冲器将无缝地结合三个关键的电信功能，即全光存储，全光整形和波长转换。在这里，使用标准的二氧化硅光纤，我们报告了颞腔孤子的首次实验观察。空洞孤子的长度为4 ps，用于演示数据流的存储时间超过一秒。我们还观察了密腔孤子的相互作用，揭示了在我们的设置中25＆＃160; Gbit＆＃160; s ＆＃8722; 1 时的潜在容量高达45,000位。从根本上说，腔孤子是局部耗散结构。因此，考虑到二氧化硅表现出纯的瞬时Kerr非线性，我们的实验构成了非线性光学中自组织现象的最简单例子之一。

title: Sub-femtojoule all-optical switching using a photonic-crystal nanocavity
title_cn: 使用光子晶体纳米腔的亚飞焦耳全光切换
abstract: Although high-speed all-optical switches are expected to replace their electrical counterparts in information processing, their relatively large size and power consumption have remained obstacles. We use a combination of an ultrasmall photonic-crystal nanocavity and strong carrier-induced nonlinearity in InGaAsP to successfully demonstrate low-energy switching within a few tens of picoseconds. Switching energies with a contrast of 3 and 10 dB of 0.42 and 0.66 fJ, respectively, have been obtained, which are over two orders of magnitude lower than those of previously reported all-optical switches. The ultrasmall cavity substantially enhances the nonlinearity as well as the recovery speed, and the switching efficiency is maximized by a combination of two-photon absorption and linear absorption in the InGaAsP nanocavities. These switches, with their chip-scale integratability, may lead to the possibility of low-power, high-density, all-optical processing in a chip.
abstract_cn: 尽管在信息处理中，高速全光开关有望替代其电气同类产品，但它们相对较大的尺寸和功耗仍然是障碍。 我们结合使用超小光子晶体纳米腔和InGaAsP中强载流子诱发的非线性，成功地在几十皮秒内证明了低能量转换。 已经获得了具有分别为0.42和0.66fJ的3和10dB的对比度的开关能量，其比先前报道的全光开关的能量低两个数量级以上。 超小腔极大地增强了非线性以及恢复速度，并且通过在InGaAsP纳米腔中结合双光子吸收和线性吸收来最大化开关效率。 这些开关具有芯片级可集成性，可能导致芯片中进行低功耗，高密度，全光处理的可能性。

title: Magnetic recording at 1.5 Pb m−2 using an integrated plasmonic antenna
title_cn: 使用集成等离子天线以1.5 Pb m-2进行磁记录
abstract: Plasmonic devices are capable of efficiently confining and enhancing optical fields, serving as a bridge between the realm of diffraction-limited optics and the nanoscale. Specifically, a plasmonic device can be used to locally heat a recording medium for data storage. Ideally, the recording medium would consist of individually addressable and non-interacting entities, a configuration that has been regarded as the ultimate future hard-drive technology. Here, we describe a plasmonic nano-antenna that is fully integrated into a magnetic recording head and its use for thermally assisted magnetic recording on both continuous and fully-ordered patterned media using nanosecond pulses in a static tester configuration. In the case of patterned media at 1.5 Pb m−2 (∼1 Tb inch−2) with 24-nm track pitch, we show ideally written bits without disturbing neighbouring tracks. We find a dramatic improvement in track width and optical efficiency compared to continuous media and show that this is largely due to advantageous near-field optical effects.
abstract_cn: 等离子体器件能够有效地限制和增强光场，并充当衍射极限光学器件领域与纳米尺度之间的桥梁。具体地，等离子体设备可以用于局部加热用于数据存储的记录介质。理想情况下，记录介质应包含可单独寻址和不交互的实体，这种配置已被视为未来的最终硬盘技术。在这里，我们描述了完全集成到磁记录头中的等离激元纳米天线，及其在静态测试仪配置中使用纳秒脉冲在连续和全序图案化介质上进行热辅助磁记录的用途。对于图案化介质为1.5＆＃160; Pb＆＃160; m <sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>（＆＃8764; 1 Tb英寸<sup>＆＃8722; 2 </ sup>）具有24 nm的轨道间距，我们可以显示理想的写入位，而不会干扰相邻的轨道。与连续介质相比，我们发现轨道宽度和光学效率有了显着改善，并表明这很大程度上是由于有利的近场光学效应所致。</ p>
